akn:content.akn:p: §§ 3381 to 3384. Omitted Editorial Notes Codification Sections were omitted in the general amendment of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965, Pub. L. 89–10, by Pub. L. 103–382, title I, § 101, Oct. 20, 1994, 108 Stat. 3519. Section 3381, Pub. L. 89–10, title IX, § 9001, formerly title VI, § 601, Apr. 11, 1965, 79 Stat. 55; renumbered title VII, § 701, Pub. L. 89–750, title I, § 161, Nov. 3, 1966, 80 Stat. 1204; renumbered title VIII, § 801, and amended Pub.
